DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this project is to examine the serotonergic transmitter system using functional imaging of the brain (positron emission tomography [PET]) to gain knowledge about early pathophysiological changes in Alzheimer's dementia and mood disorders.
DOC.brief_title: The Serotonergic Transmitter System in Dementia and Affective Disorders
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe Alzheimer's disease Individuals genetically predisposed to affective disorder Healthy gender and age matched controls Contraindications to magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) Use of psychoactive drugs Past or present affective disorder Other systemic diseases that may affect brain function
